p.d: Géraud is an internet fraudster, one of those referred to in Ivory Coast slang as "brouteurs". Locked-up in prison he accepted, in exchange for his freedom, to help the French and Ivory Coast authorities to track a cybercriminal known as "Fantôme". An adventure filled with unexpected twists, lies and betrayals... Directed by: Alain Guikou (Ivory Coast, season 3, 2016) Cast: Franck Vlehi (Géraud), Aurélie Eliam (Cynthia), Landry Gnamba (Camso), Guy Kalou (Blanco), Jean-Baptiste Sagory (Deschamps), Lorene Thaumass (the captain), Hicham Jésus Meroueh (El Bachir), Yann Barjat (Tarek), Michel Bohiri (Director of the Artci), Elodie Hilaire (Fantôme), Pat Saco (Guy) Genre: detective
